mapper.select: select g.id_guia ,g.i_numero ,g.d_fecha_emision ,g.id_transportista ,g.id_destino ,g.id_origen ,g.s_patente ,g.id_estado ,g.s_vigente ,o.s_nombre ,o.s_tipo as s_tipo_origen ,o.s_direccion ,c.s_nombre as s_comuna from sstt_ordenes_trabajo ot inner join sstt_bitacoras b on b.id_ot = ot.id_ot inner join sstt_guias g on b.id_guia = g.id_guia and g.id_estado in (50002000, 50008000,50009000) inner join sstt_ubicaciones o on o.id_ubicacion = g.id_origen inner join sstt_comunas c on c.id_comuna = o.id_comuna inner join sstt_recepciones_camion_guias rcg on rcg.id_guia = g.id_guia inner join sstt_recepciones_camion rc on rc.id_recepcion_camion = rcg.id_recepcion_camion and rc.id_estado = 80001000 inner join owv_transportistas t on t.id_transportista = rc.id_transportista where ot.id_ot = #{ordenTrabajo.id} and ((g.id_origen = #{origen.id} and g.id_destino = #{destino.id}) or (g.id_origen = #{origen.id} and g.id_destino = 11))

select ot.id_producto, ot.id_ot from sstt_ordenes_trabajo ot where ot.s_vigente = 'S' and ot.s_cerrada = 'N' and ot.s_cerrada_cliente = 'S' and ot.id_estado = 10003000 and not exists (select 1 from sstt_guias g where g.id_ot = ot.id_ot) and (ot.s_tipo_cambio = #{tipoCambio} or ot.s_tipo_cambio_jt = #{tipoCambioJT}) and ot.id_sucursal = #{idUbicacion} and ot.s_procesado_ow = #{procesadaOW} order by ot.id_producto
mapper.delete: delete sstt_guias g where g.s_vigente = 'S' and g.id_estado = 50001000 and g.id_origen = #{idUbicacion} and g.id_ot is null
mapper.select: select g.id_guia ,g.id_origen ,g.id_destino ,g.s_vigente ,g.s_tipo_guia from sstt_guias g where g.s_vigente = 'S' and g.id_estado = 50001000 and g.id_origen = #{idUbicacion} and g.id_ot is null

select count(distinct g.id_guia) from sstt_guias g inner join sstt_bitacoras b on b.id_guia = g.id_guia inner join sstt_ordenes_trabajo ot on ot.id_ot = b.id_ot where g.s_vigente = 'S' and g.id_estado IN (50001000, 50001500, 50002000) and g.id_origen = #{idUbicacion} and g.id_ot is null

select count(distinct g.id_guia) from sstt_guias g inner join sstt_bitacoras b on b.id_guia = g.id_guia inner join sstt_ordenes_trabajo ot on ot.id_ot = b.id_ot where g.s_vigente = 'S' and g.id_estado IN (50001000, 50001500) and g.id_origen = #{idUbicacion} and g.id_destino = 11 and g.id_ot is null

select count(distinct g.id_guia) from sstt_guias g inner join sstt_bitacoras b on b.id_guia = g.id_guia inner join sstt_ordenes_trabajo ot on ot.id_ot = b.id_ot where g.s_vigente = 'S' and g.id_estado in (50001000,50001500) and g.id_origen = #{idUbicacion} and g.id_ot is null

select ot.id_producto, p.s_descripcion, m.s_nombre, count(distinct ac.id_accesorio) as cant_accesorios, count(distinct ot.id_ot) as cant_ot, OWF_OBTENER_COSTO_PRODUCTO(ot.id_producto) as i_costo from sstt_guias g inner join sstt_bitacoras b on b.id_guia = g.id_guia inner join sstt_ordenes_trabajo ot on ot.id_ot = b.id_ot left join owv_productos p on p.id_producto = ot.id_producto left join owv_marcas m on m.id_marca = p.id_marca left join sstt_accesorios ac on ((ac.id_producto = p.id_producto) or (ac.id_familia = p.id_familia )) and ac.s_vigente = 'S' where g.id_guia = #{id} group by ot.id_producto, p.s_descripcion, m.s_nombre

select g.id_guia ,g.id_estado ,g.id_ot ,g.id_origen ,g.id_destino ,g.id_usuario ,g.id_transportista ,g.i_numero ,g.d_fecha_emision ,g.d_fecha_registro ,g.s_patente ,g.s_vigente ,g.s_observacion ,g.s_entrega_cliente ,g.d_fecha_impresion ,g.id_estado_actual ,g.d_fecha_ultimo_estado ,g.s_procesado_ow ,g.i_nmro_ts_to ,g.i_nmro_to from sstt_guias g where g.id_guia = #{id}

select ot.id_ot ,rcg.id_recepcion_camion ,ot.id_producto from sstt_ordenes_trabajo ot inner join sstt_bitacoras b on b.id_ot = ot.id_ot and b.d_fecha_salida is null and b.id_estado = #{idEstadoBitacora} and b.id_ubicacion = #{idUbicacion} inner join sstt_bitacoras c on c.id_ot = ot.id_ot and c.id_bitacora = (select max(d.id_bitacora) from sstt_bitacoras d where d.id_ot = ot.id_ot and d.id_ubicacion is not null and d.id_bitacora != b.id_bitacora) inner join sstt_recepciones_camion_guias rcg on rcg.id_guia = c.id_guia where ot.id_estado = #{idEstadoOT} and ot.s_vigente = 'S' and ot.s_cerrada = 'N' and ot.s_cerrada_cliente = 'S' and not exists (select 1 from sstt_guias g where g.id_ot = ot.id_ot)
